room_title: Escape room "Insane Asylum II" by PanIQ Room in Washington, D.C.
review: The Insane Asylum is their hardest room - we were told that only 1 group in 9 makes it out. With a few last-minute hints from our very helpful host through the provided walkie-talkie, we were able to escape! The room was pretty creepy, as you'd expect a good insane asylum themed room to be. We love PanIQ and will be coming back sometime to attempt their third room!

room_title: Escape room "Insane Asylum II" by PanIQ Room in Washington, D.C.
review: The "Insane Asylum" room is extremely difficult but it was still a lot of fun. The ambiance in there is actually pretty scary with a track playing screams the whole time. But it was still a lot of fun and honestly, we would go back to try and escape the "Insane Asylum" again.

room_title: Escape room "Insane Asylum II" by PanIQ Room in Washington, D.C.
review: Great time had even though we did not make it out of Insane Asylum!

room_title: Escape room "Insane Asylum II" by PanIQ Room in Washington, D.C.
review: I took my kids there (who think they know everything) went into the Insane Asylum II and wow I was impressed. This room keeps you thinking and definitely makes you have to work together as a team! Recommend it to anyone.

room_title: Escape room "Insane Asylum II" by PanIQ Room in Washington, D.C.
review: My husband and I had to escape from the asylum. We had a lot of fun! The staff was great and helpful especially when we needed hints. We plan on coming back to do the prehistoric room very soon.
